name: Ribvolver
description:
Four players face off in a deadly standoff. Each frog has two guns loaded with a single bullet. Who will dare fire first?

IMPORTANT NOTES:

This is a local four player game. Although there is A.I, Ribvolver is best played with four humans!

A Controller is required to play this game!

CONTROLS:

Left / Right Trigger: Draw Left / Right weapon

Left / Right Sticks: Point Left / Right weapon

Left / Right bumper: Fire Left / Right weapon

Fully holding down the triggers will make your aim very unsteady¬! Stabilise your weapon by holding down the trigger half way between held/released.

GAME FEATURES

  • Tense Standoffs!
  • A variety of levels!
  • Secrets!
  • Built-in A.I for players that don't have three friends/controllers available!
  • Co-Op Wave Defense coming soon!
